divs: sighting detailsi was watching tv when i herd jets from china lake naval base fly over my house as thay do all the time but this time thay were so loud i couldnt hear the tv (and i play it loud) so i step out my back door i look up an see 4 jets wingtip to wingtip i couldnt see the jets but i could see each of there red tail lights and there afterburners i was thinking man you guys are flying low an fast for this time of night so i started to step back into the house an out of the corner of my eye i saw a light comming from the east just south of the trona pinikels theres a small montain range that runs east to west an crosses the 395 hwy dies into the desert just before hwy 14 and the sierra mt range as i watch the light i can see this sphere or (foo fighter class ufo )is moving and moving fast it was flying just above the mt range and about the time it got to the 395 hwy the mt range starts to brake up and thats when i saw the smaller sphere flying right below it i never lost site of the big one the hole time but i did with the smaller one every time there was a brake in the mt range i could see the small one an i was in shock after thay past the last mt in that range i watched in shock as thay blinked out about the time thay pass over hwy 14 at the same time just like someone turned off a light switch im an old marine i have seen all kinds aircraft an that was not from this planet the big one had to be 2 or 3 hunderd feet in diameter the small about 1\4 the size of the big one after that i put on a pot if coffee and watched the night sky all night no lie i guess i was in shock the navy was looking for it most of the night i watched them fly over the area where the ufos blinked out for hours the hole sighting lasted about 8 sec in that time the ufos traviled about 40or 50 miles i dont know how fast that is but thay where cooking this is a true story and ufos are real.
